Draft.js by Facebook

Draft.js is a framework for building rich text editors in React, powered by an immutable model and abstracting over cross-browser differences.

Core Concepts

Draft.js provides a set of core building blocks:

  • EditorState - An immutable record representing the entire state of the editor
  • ContentState - The contents of the editor
  • SelectionState - The current selection or cursor position

Text Styling

Draft.js supports inline styles like bold, italic, underline, and code. You can also create custom inline styles for your application.

Block Types

Several block types are supported out of the box:

  1. Headers (h1 through h6)
  2. Blockquotes
  3. Code blocks
  4. Unordered and ordered lists

Draft.js is used in production by Facebook for comments, notes, and messenger.

Installation

npm install draft-js react react-dom

Check out the docs to get started.
